categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Robin Pearce is an actor and director who is known for his roles in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,  The Darkest Hour, and Black Mirror and for directing the short One Day Like This.
In 2016, Pearce was hired to play a Rebel technician in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. He had previously acted in an episode of the television series Black Mirror.
